entry.title: Linux Repeat
entry.content:
linux下循环执行命令

```

vi ~/.bash_aliases

```

``` repeat() {

n=100
s=1

while true; do
    arg=$1
    if [ "$arg" == "-n" ]; then
        n=$2
        shift
        shift
    elif [ "$arg" == "-s" ]; then
        s=$2
        shift
        shift
    else
        break
    fi
done

while [ $((n -= 1)) -ge 0 ]; do
    "$@"
    sleep $s
done

} ```

```

source ~/.bash_aliases

```

```

repeat ls -l
repeat date
repeat iostat
repeat -n 3 curl 'http://www.lianghaijun.com'
repeat -n 3 -s 300 curl 'http://www.lianghaijun.com'
repeat -n 3 -s 0.5 sh -c "curl -I -s 'http://www.lianghaijun.com' | head -1"

```
